dct_description_sm: With imprint Apud Clement de Ionghe A. 1661.
LC 3437; Wagner 387; Leighly 41; Koeman, I, All2(492); Koeman, II, Jon1; Burden 362 (Plate 362, State 1).

California with indented northern coast. "Agubela de Cato" is peninsula on mainland near northeast tip of California. Nothing further north. Very few details of interior of North America. Title cartouche (upper left) topped with female native riding large armadillo, same as on DeWit's map of 1660.
